task_description:
# Enhanced OCR Constraint Detection

Improve OCR accuracy for reading constraint numbers and text from puzzle screenshots. Currently OCR struggles with various fonts, sizes, and image qualities.

## Rationale
Constraint detection is critical for puzzle solving. Users currently experience failures when constraints aren't read correctly, requiring manual correction. Improving OCR directly addresses the pain point of 40-60% detection accuracy on complex puzzles.

## User Stories
- As a puzzle enthusiast, I want the app to correctly read constraint numbers so that I get accurate solutions
- As a mobile user, I want OCR to work reliably with my phone's screenshot quality so that I don't have to retake photos

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] OCR correctly reads constraint numbers in 90%+ of standard puzzle screenshots
- [ ] OCR handles different font sizes and styles
- [ ] OCR works with both high and low resolution images
- [ ] Preprocessing pipeline optimizes images for text recognition
